email_chain.subject: Inquiry for Coal Shipment from Newcastle to Shanghai
email_chain.body:
Dear Sophia,

I hope you're doing well. We are looking to ship 50,000MT of coal from Newcastle to Shanghai under CIF terms. Could you please provide a suitable vessel and a freight quote?

Best regards,
Liam Carter

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry for Coal Shipment from Newcastle to Shanghai
email_chain.body:
Hi Liam,

Thank you for your inquiry. We have the MV OCEAN STAR available, with a DWT of 75,000 and LOA of 225m. The laycan is 15-20 November. The starting freight quote is USD 25/MT. Let me know if this works for you.

Best,
Sophia

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry for Coal Shipment from Newcastle to Shanghai
email_chain.body:
Sophia,

Thanks for the quick response. USD 25/MT seems a bit high. Could you provide more details on the vessel's specifications and the demurrage rate? Also, is there any flexibility in the freight rate?

Best regards,
Liam

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry for Coal Shipment from Newcastle to Shanghai - Additional Details
email_chain.body:
Liam,

The MV OCEAN STAR is equipped with 5 cargo holds and has a speed of 14 knots. The demurrage rate is USD 15,000 per day. Considering your concerns, we can revise the freight quote to USD 23/MT. Does this meet your requirements?

Best,
Sophia

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry for Coal Shipment from Newcastle to Shanghai - Finalizing Details
email_chain.body:
Sophia,

USD 23/MT is acceptable. Please confirm the laycan dates and the demurrage rate. Also, could you provide the final contract details for review?

Best regards,
Liam

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry for Coal Shipment from Newcastle to Shanghai - Confirmation
email_chain.body:
Liam,

The laycan is confirmed for 15-20 November, and the demurrage rate is USD 15,000 per day. I will send the final contract details shortly. Thank you for your business.

Best,
Sophia
